version_description:
In order for users to have a better gaming experience when playing Mergical, we are constantly improving the game. The new version is released, come and update it.

1. Bugs fixed.

Thank you for the continuous support and we will continue to work hard to improve Mergical. If you find any bugs or any suggestions, feel free to give us a feedback and we will fix them as soon as possible.

In order for users to have a better gaming experience when playing Mergical, we are constantly improving the game. The new version is released, come and update it.

1. Bugs fixed.

Thank you for the continuous support and we will continue to work hard to improve Mergical. If you find any bugs or any suggestions, feel free to give us a feedback and we will fix them as soon as possible.

1. Bugs fixed.

Thank you for the continuous support and we will continue to work hard to improve Mergical. If you find any bugs or any suggestions, feel free to give us a feedback and we will fix them as soon as possible.
Significantly improved game performance stability and gaming experience.
Significantly improved game performance stability and gaming experience.
Significantly improved game performance stability and gaming experience.

The new version 1.2.3 is released, come and update it!

1. Excited new activity is coming! Enjoy your vacation on the beautiful island with sunshine, breeze and beach!
2. We fixed some bugs in order for users to have a better gaming experience!

Thank you for the continuous support and we will continue to work hard to improve Mergical. If you find any bugs or any suggestions, feel free to give us a feedback and we will fix them as soon as possible.

The new version 1.2.4 is released, come and update it!

1. Wow, a sweet & romantic Valentine's Day is coming! Let's enjoy this lovely day with our Prince Charming, who happens to be a bear. 
-In this lovely world, you can encounter a variety of love trees. The love stories of a bear prince and princess are engraved into the statue, and you can even merge the little cute bears. You will also obtain the limited edition 2020 Valentine’s Ferris Wheel by completing the tasks.
2. We fixed some bugs in order for users to have a better gaming experience!

Thank you for the continuous support and we will continue to work hard to improve Mergical. If you find any bugs or any suggestions, feel free to give us a feedback and we will fix them as soon as possible.

The new version 1.2.7 is released, come and update it!
1. White Valentine's Day is coming! A new secret area is about to open. Let's enjoy the day with cute bunny girls waiting for your arrival!
2. The mysterious Turtle Island is available! Countless treasures on the island waiting for you to explore!
3. Many incredible items have been added to the store within the camp, you can earn it when you buy it!
4. Optimized ui of coin, exploration value and sales.

Let’s see what’s new in version 1.2.9!
1.  Everything comes back to life in this season. Spring Mystery Land will open. Kite boys and Sports girls who love the outdoors are playing on this beautiful new land. Look forward to your joining!
2.  This update includes a large number of optimizations.
3.  A few bugs have been fixed.

Easter comes. Come and update to version 1.2.10 for a limited time!
1. Here comes Easter! A brand-new event is about to start! Nauty Easter Bunny and sweet Easter Fox have come to Mergical world. Colored Easter eggs and desserts also appear in Easter Paradise! They are waiting for you to enjoy!
-Easter Bunny, Easter Fox and colored Easter eggs? How interesting! Update and have fun in Easter Paradise!
2. Enjoy the fun of collecting!
3. Some bugs have been fixed to optimize the game experience.

Version 1.2.12 is now available!
1. A beautiful Sakura Mystery Land has appeared on Mergical! With cute peach boys and blossom girls chilling under the Sakura trees, while eating delicious Sakura sweets. Come and explore this magical paradise!
2. The new function "Assistant" is here, it can help you organize elements faster!
3. We have optimized certain production methods, to make them more logical.
4. Optimized the display of bubbles for tips and hints.
5. Increased the sensitivity of in-game tapping.
6. Optimized the tutorial to offer better assistance.

1.2.19 is available now!
1. The IOS version now features log-in with an Apple ID.
2. A Blue Planet Realm has appeared in Mergical! To save the environment, many Environmental Enthusiasts and Scavengers have gathered together to help you in the Blue Planet Operation.
3. Added the weather, Rainstorm. Be careful not to leave the Water Puddles unattended, or they will spread. Clear the puddles can help you discover mysterious rewards!
4. Fixed an issue that caused videos not to play. More advanced Digital Dolls are coming soon!

Version 1.2.32 is out now!
1. Christmas is arriving. Santa and his Reindeers are bringing many presents to the realm. However, the snowmen still lack a Christmas tree. Would you like to give them a hand? (Please beware of thieves~)
2. Ranked Champions League will be here soon! Bring your skills to the arena and test them out against other players, and also to win a variety of rewards.
3. The scavenger match has a new rule! Achieve win-streaks to earn higher ranking points!

Version 1.2.55 is out now!
1. The Individual Point Event is now available! Keep earning rewards by collecting Points in your Home!
2. Mergical Collection just got a facelift! Now you will earn bonus rewards for acquiring new elements!
3. Adjusted the Worker Gathering placements. Now your workers will gather from the objects they are closest to.
4. Fixed a bug with some Daily Tasks that caused them to be undoable.
5. Fixed a bug that caused the font sizes for some languages to be too small to read.

4. Fixed a bug with some Daily Tasks that caused them to be undoable.
5. Fixed a bug that caused the font sizes for some languages to be too small to read.

Update 1.2.66 is here!
1. Halloween is arriving soon.
2. A new feature has been added to the Settings. You can now turn off Auto Gather for your Companions.
3. We added a feature to the settings for you to turn off Auto Production for your buildings.
4. Optimized some Levels.

1. Halloween is arriving soon.

3. We added a feature to the settings for you to turn off Auto Production for your buildings.
4. Optimized some Levels.

Update 1.2.69 is out now!
1. Optimized some Hero Features: A. You can now view the Heroes you have not obtained. B. When a Hero is tapped, they will immediately leave the tile they are on. C. Upgraded the visual experience of Hero showcase interface.

Update 1.2.70 is out now!
1. Optimized the Voyage system: A. The regions you can sail to are now more visible and obvious. B. Redesigned the Island and Station interfaces.
2.All new Thanksgiving Event is almost here!
3. You will receive the items you purchase from the Shop in a whole new way! This will also apply to many other features.
